yeah we actually have been selling

are some people that are selling

if I had some property I could mortgage

Outer Space Treaty of 1967 states no
nation by appropriation shall have
sovereignty or control over any of the
satellite bodies nowhere in the outer
space treaty doesn't mention anything
about individuals this is the loophole
that gave me the impetus to file a claim
of ownership for the moon
then I sent a note to the United Nations
stating that if they had a legal problem

heard from them we have sold just under
six hundred million acres on the moon so
far and that's growing by about 200

regardless of which properties we sell
you are all the same price
there are 19.99 cents plus a dollar

be $24 we have five million seven
hundred and forty some thousand

its novelty idea and the word novelty
just so people know in the American

if this doesn't fall into that category
and that definition I don't know what
does it doesn't have anything to do with

they'll have embassies there as well
only the moon is very interesting it's a

I've never seen myself that way at all
and it's not that I'm the brightest

interesting story in 1999 a person by
